feed.title: The Lousson Project's PEAR Channel Latest Releases

entry.title: Lousson_Config 1.0.1 (stable)
entry.content:
The lousson/config package provides flexible facilities for application configuration and setup - in various formats.
No notes.

entry.title: Lousson_Config 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The lousson/config package provides flexible facilities for application configuration and setup - in various formats.
No notes.

entry.title: Lousson_Config 0.4.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The lousson/config package provides flexible facilities for application configuration and setup - in various formats.
No notes.

entry.title: Lousson_Container 1.2.1 (stable)
entry.content:
The lousson/Lousson_Container package is a portability layer for any dependency management system used within an application. It allows the authors of libraries to create packages that easily can get integrated with or even use the context's facilities
No notes.

entry.content:

entry.title: Lousson_Exception 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Exception package consists of a standard exception interface, specific for the Lousson-project, and a bunch of error classes extending PHP and SPL exceptions and implementing the interface.
Initial release.

entry.title: Lousson_Logger 1.2.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Logger package provides a set of facilities to create logger instances that are compatible with the PSR-3 specification - optionally even based on other implmentations that are not
Initial release.

entry.content:

Initial release.

entry.title: Lousson_Message_AMQP 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Message_AMQP package is a plugin for Lousson_Message that provides an AMQP integration with the messaging facilities
A working draft in-progress.

entry.title: Lousson_Message_AMQP 0.1.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Message_AMQP package is a plugin for Lousson_Message that provides an AMQP integration with the messaging facilities
A working draft in-progress.

entry.title: Lousson_Message_Record 0.1.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Message_Record package is an extension of the facilities provided by Lousson_Record, consisting of a set of decorators to ease the creation and exchange of record messages
A working draft in-progress.

entry.title: Lousson_Record 1.2.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Record package eases the creation of portable data records that are serializable in various formats.
Initial release.

entry.title: Lousson_Sniffs 0.4.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_Sniffs package is used for both, maintaining the Lousson Project's coding-styles as well as providing an integration with PHP_CodeSniffer.
Initial release.

entry.title: Lousson_URI 1.1.0 (stable)
entry.content:
The Lousson_URI package consists of entities to represent, validate and transform URNs and URLs.
Initial release.
